TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DeploymentDownloadException extends System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException

summary.span: 指出在下載 ClickOnce 資訊清單或部署檔案至用戶端電腦時有錯誤發生。

span.span: Indicates that there was an error downloading either the ClickOnce manifests or the deployment's files to the client computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可能表示使用者嘗試下載時發生一些問題[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]應用程式更新：A can indicate that a number of problems occurred when the user tried to download a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application update: - 用戶端電腦的網路連線已關閉。The client's computer's network connection is down. - 網頁伺服器、 FTP 伺服器或檔案共用裝載更新則無法使用。The Web server, FTP server, or file share hosting the update is unavailable. - 一或多個檔案中[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]找不到部署。One or more of the files in the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment was not found. 若要取得詳細的錯誤例外狀況相關資訊，請參閱[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]錯誤記錄檔。To obtain detailed error information about an exception, consult the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] error log. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[疑難排解 ClickOnce 部署](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58e90012-f68b-4852-8ae9-58e361cbcc32)。For more information, see [Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58e90012-f68b-4852-8ae9-58e361cbcc32). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會同步執行，安裝應用程式更新，並向使用者回報，如果發生問題，下載資訊清單或部署的檔案。The following code example installs an application update synchronously, and reports to the user if there was a problem downloading either the manifests or the deployment's files. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用描述例外狀況的訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a message that describes the exception.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.
